text: @neal_katyal @lrozen Covid-19 has a very easy test for insurers to deny coverage of ICU & Ventilators to tens of millions of Americans. They will be left to die in their homes. Three loud knocks on their door... no answer... a big C spray painted on their door... Coroner collects the dead in a week.
